events.name: CartItemAdded
events.description: Captures the moment an item is added to the shopping cart.

events.name: CartItemRemoved
events.description: Records when an item is removed from the shopping cart.

events.name: CartDiscountApplied
events.description: Tracks when a discount is applied to the shopping cart.

events.name: CartShippingInfoUpdated
events.description: Logs updates to shipping information for the cart.

commands.name: AddItem
commands.description: Captures the moment an item is added to the shopping cart.

commands.name: RemoveItem
commands.description: Records when an item is removed from the shopping cart.

commands.name: ApplyDiscount
commands.description: Tracks when a discount is applied to the shopping cart.

commands.name: UpdateShippingInfo
commands.description: Logs updates to shipping information for the cart.

integrationPoints.name: Payment
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with payment processing when the cart is submitted.

integrationPoints.name: Inventory
integrationPoints.description: Sync with inventory management when items are added or removed from the cart.
